title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer Season 10 Issue 01 (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.




By:   	Christos Gage, Rebekah Isaacs, Dan Jackson, Steve Morris	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Action-Adventure, Fantasy, Horror
Series:   	Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Publisher:   	Dark Horse	
Pub. Date:   	March 19, 2014
Availability:   	Released
UPC:   	76156822559400111
Details:   	Full color, 32 pages; Ongoing

New season. New rules. The age-old battle of Slayer vs. vampire is the focus of Buffy's life once again-it's downright nostalgic! But with all the toying with magic she's done lately, this girl should know it's time for another game change . . . Shouldn't she?

* Executive produced by Joss Whedon!

* Next month, Angel & Faith returns!
